title: Insider Selling: Bitcoin Depot Inc. (NASDAQ:BTM) COO Sells 29,524 Shares of Stock
description: Bitcoin Depot Inc. (NASDAQ:BTM - Get Free Report) COO Christopher Scott Buchanan sold 29,524 shares of the stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, April 1st. The stock was sold at an average price of $1.44, for a total transaction of $42,514.56. Following the transaction, the chief operating officer now owns 189,752 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $273,242.88. This represents a 13.46 % decrease in their ownership of the stock. The transaction was disclosed in a legal filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available at this link.
